description: This table stores discrete result component information received from outside sources.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: RESULT_COMP_KEY
columns.description: Key to link the component with the order

columns.name: COMP_REFID
columns.description: Unique Identifier for each result component.

columns.name: RESULT_COMP_NAME
columns.description: Free text name for the result component

columns.name: RESULT_COMP_ID
columns.description: This item stores the mapped result component in the internal system.

columns.name: RESULT_COMP_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the component.

columns.name: RESULT_COMP_ABBR
columns.description: result component abbreviation

columns.name: RESULT_COMP_GROUP
columns.description: grouper for the result components

columns.name: RESULT_COMP_LOINC
columns.description: LOINC code for this result component

columns.name: RESULT_VALUE
columns.description: Actual value of the result

columns.name: RES_VAL_ST_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: RES_VAL_END_LINE
columns.description: The end line of result text in stored in Result Impression Information.

columns.name: COMPONENT_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment of a result component when less than 255 characters.

columns.name: COMP_CMT_ST_LINE
columns.description: The line number of result component comments greater than 254 characters

columns.name: COMP_CMT_END_LINE
columns.description: The line number of result component comments greater than 254 characters

columns.name: RESULT_UNITS
columns.description: Units of measure for the result

columns.name: RESULT_FLAG_NAME
columns.description: Free text version of the results flag

columns.name: RESULT_FLAG_C_NAME
columns.description:
Abnormal flag for the result


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


(NONE)


Abnormal


Panic


Low


High


Low Panic


High Panic


Low Off-Scale


High Off-Scale


Sig Change Up


Sig Change Down


Better


Worse


Sensitive


Resistant


Intermediate


Moderately Sensitive


Very Sensitive

columns.name: RESULT_LOW_RANGE
columns.description: Low end of the normal range for this result

columns.name: RESULT_HIGH_RANGE
columns.description: High end of the normal range for this result

columns.name: RESULT_NORMAL
columns.description: Normal reference range for the result

columns.name: RESULT_COMP_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Status for the individual result component


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Aborted


Active


Cancelled


Completed


Held


New


Suspended


Nullified


Obsolete

columns.name: UNRECOG_VALUE_TYPE
columns.description: One or more types of values that couldn't be parsed from CDA.

columns.name: LRR_ID_AND_INSTANT
columns.description: The linked component record ID for this component, concatenated with the result instant.

columns.name: COMP_LOINC_AND_INST
columns.description: The LOINC code for this component, concatenated with the result instant

columns.name: RSLT_COMP_STAT_ID_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the mapped result component status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Preliminary


Final


Corrected


Incomplete

columns.name: RSLT_COMP_LOINC_ID
columns.description: This item stores the mapped LOINC ID for a result LOINC code.

columns.name: COMP_LAB_REF_IDENT
columns.description: This item stores the lab reference ID for a specific component of a result.

columns.name: RSLT_VALUE_RTF_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Notes record that contains the result value in RTF format.

columns.name: RSLT_COMMENT_RTF_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Notes record that contains the result comment in RTF format.

columns.name: COMP_SIGNATURE
columns.description: Signature of the pathologist who verified the component

columns.name: COMP_SIG_ST_LINE
columns.description: The line number of result component signatures greater than 200 characters

columns.name: COMP_SIG_END_LINE
columns.description: The end line number of result component signatures greater than 200 characters

columns.name: RESULT_COMP_LRR
columns.description: LRR .1 Identifier for result component

columns.name: RSLT_COMP_EFF_TIME_DTTM
columns.description: This is the result time parsed from a component associated with a result. This will be used instead of the result time when populated for searching for result components for non-Epic organizations.
